하나님이 아시기 때문에: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='g1a' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.7'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='g1b' cx='50%' cy='30%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='g1c' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='glow1'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feFlood flood-color='#B4E7F4' flood-opacity='0.4'/><feComposite in2='offsetblur' operator='in'/><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='85' ry='85' fill='url(#g1a)' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 100 30 Q 120 50 100 80 Q 80 50 100 30 Z' fill='url(#g1b)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow1)'/><circle cx='100' cy='55' r='15' fill='url(#g1c)' opacity='0.9' filter='url(#glow1)'/><path d='M 60 90 Q 100 70 140 90 Q 100 110 60 90 Z' fill='url(#g1b)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='130' rx='50' ry='30' fill='url(#g1a)' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#glow1)'/></svg>
